title: Brand New Bawa Style House For Sale
details:
Brand New, Bawa inspired, spacious house for sale. Spread out over 13+ perches and designed and outfitted with the highest grade fittings, this almost completed home awaits a family that enjoys an open layout with ample natural lighting and airflow. Situated just off the new Ministry of Defense Road in Pelawatte and only 1km from Pelawatte junction, the close proximity to all conveniences and major roads increase the value and attraction of this property.

Don't miss this opportunity to own the home of your dreams. Highest offer within 2 weeks will be closed. Closing date is June 10th.


Email - yohan@khane.lk
Mobile - 0774 800 623
